alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued November 01 at 1:49AM EDT until November 01 at 1:00PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches for a storm total of 6 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Ashtabula Inland county. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The event is transitioning to a traditional lake effect snow event with a heavy snow band expected across Ashtabula County during the pre-dawn hours this morning. Snowfall rates of one inch per hour will occur with this band. The highest snowfall accumulations will be expected south of I-90, where temperatures will be cold enough to sustain snow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
